trans-unit.source: Displays the values of a data source in a table where each column represents a field and each row represents a record.
trans-unit.target: Viser verdiene i en datakilde i en tabell der hver kolonne som representerer et felt og hver rad representerer en post.

trans-unit.source: The GridView control enables you to select, sort, and edit these items.
trans-unit.target: GridView-kontrollen kan du velge, sortere og redigere disse elementene.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Column Fields](#column_fields) - [Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [Data Operations](#data_operations) - [Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [Events](#events) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The GridView control is used to display the values of a data source in a table.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [Kolonnefelter](#column_fields) - [Binding til Data](#binding_to_data) - [av data](#data_operations) - [tilpasse brukergrensesnittet](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [hendelser](#events) - [tilgjengelighet](#accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## Innføring i GridView kontroll brukes til å vise verdiene i en datakilde i en tabell.

trans-unit.source: Each column represents a field, while each row represents a record.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne representerer et felt under hver rad representerer en post.

trans-unit.source: The GridView control supports the following features: - Binding to data source controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen GridView støtter følgende funksjoner: - Binding til kontroller for datakilden, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Built-in sort capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Sorter innebygde funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Built-in update and delete capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde oppdatere og slette funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Built-in paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde Bla-funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Built-in row selection capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde rad utvalget funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Programmatic access to the GridView object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: -Programmatisk tilgang til GridView objektmodellen kan angi egenskaper, dynamisk håndtere hendelser og så videre.

trans-unit.source: - Multiple key fields.
trans-unit.target: -Flere nøkkelfelt.

trans-unit.source: - Multiple data fields for the hyperlink columns.
trans-unit.target: -Flere datafelt for hyperlink-kolonner.

trans-unit.source: - Customizable appearance through themes and styles.
trans-unit.target: – Tilpasningsbart utseende via tema og stiler.

trans-unit.source: - To learn about the other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil vite mer om andre databundet kontrollene som er tilgjengelig i ASP.NET, kan du se [Databindingselementer Server webkontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are familiar with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control from the .NET Framework version 1.0, the GridView control is the successor to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du er kjent med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen fra .NET Framework, versjon 1.0, GridView kontrollen er etterfølgende til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: ## Column Fields Each column in the GridView control is represented by a object.
trans-unit.target: ## Kolonnen felt hver kolonne i GridView kontrollen er representert av en objektet.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, which creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField> object for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>er satt til `true`, som oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField>objekt for hvert felt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then rendered as a column in the GridView control in the order that each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt gjengis deretter som en kolonne i GridView kontrollen i rekkefølgen som vises hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You can also manually control which column fields appear in the GridView control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false` and then defining your own column field collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også manuelt kontrollere hvilken kolonne felt vises i GridView-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>egenskapen `false` og definere din egen kolonne feltet samling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Different column field types determine the behavior of the columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: Annen kolonnetyper fastsetter virkemåten til kolonnene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different column field types that can be used.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen feltet kolonnetypene som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: |Column field type|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Feltet kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button for each item in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard kolonnetypen kontrollens GridView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>| Viser en kommandoknapp for hvert element i kontrollen GridView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box for each item in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å opprette en kolonne med egendefinerte knappekontroller, for eksempel Legg til eller fjern. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>| Viser en avmerkingsboks for hvert element i kontrollen GridView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen brukes vanligvis til å vise felt med en boolsk verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>| Viser forhåndsdefinert kommandoknappene for å utføre Velg, redigere eller slette operasjoner. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image for each item in the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content for each item in the GridView control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen gjør det mulig å binde andre felt til hyperkoblingen URL-adresse. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>| Viser et bilde for hvert element i kontrollen GridView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>| Viser en brukerdefinert innhold for hvert element i GridView kontrollen i henhold til en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| To define a column field collection declaratively, first add opening and closing `<Columns>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen lar deg opprette et egendefinert kolonnefelt. | Hvis du vil definere en kolonne feltet samling deklarativt, først legge til åpner og lukker `<Columns>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens GridView.

trans-unit.source: Next, list the column fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Columns>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Vis neste kolonnefelter som du vil inkludere mellom innledende og avsluttende `<Columns>` koder.

trans-unit.source: The columns specified are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene som er angitt, er lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samling i rekkefølgen som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection stores all the column fields in the control and enables you to programmatically manage the column fields in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen lagrer alle kolonnen felt i kontrollen, og gjør mulig å programmatisk administrere kolonnefelter GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared column fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelter kan vises i kombinasjon med automatisk genererte kolonnefelter.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, gjengis eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelter først, etterfulgt av de automatisk genererte kolonnefeltene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Automatically generated column fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Automatisk genererte kolonnefelter er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Binding to Data The GridView control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types.
trans-unit.target: ## Bindingen til Data i GridView kontrollen kan være bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data (som den kontrollen eller kontrollen) eller kildesamlingen alle data som implementerer den grensesnitt som , , , eller andre samlingstyper.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to bind the GridView control to the appropriate data source type: - To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the GridView control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk følgende metoder for å binde GridView-kontroll til den riktige datakildetypen: – å binde til en kilde-kontroll for data må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>GridView kontrollen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>verdien kontrollens datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GridView control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, updating, deleting, and paging.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen GridView binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen og kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner til å utføre sortering, oppdatere, slette og bla automatisk.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden ikke binde til data.

trans-unit.source: - To bind to a data source that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface, programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the GridView control to the data source and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Skal bindes til en datakilde som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnitt angir programmatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>for GridView kontrollere til datakilden, og kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When using this method, the GridView control does not provide built-in sort, update, delete, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne metoden, gir ikke GridView-kontrollen innebygde sortering oppdateringen, og Slett Bla funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Du må oppgi denne funksjonaliteten ved å bruke riktig hendelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om databinding [ASP.NET dataene tilgang til innhold kartet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class HTML-encodes values by default).
trans-unit.target: Når det er mulig, anbefales det sterkt at verdiene er HTML-kodet før de vises i kontrollen (den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>klasse HTML-koder verdier som standard).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [innføring i validering Kontroller](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190).

trans-unit.source: ## Data Operations The GridView control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to sort, update, delete, select, and page through items in the control.
trans-unit.target: ## Av data GridView-kontrollen har mange innebygde funksjoner som tillater brukeren å sortere, oppdatere, slette, merker og bla gjennom elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the GridView control is bound to a data source control, the GridView control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, update, and delete functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når GridView-kontrollen er bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data, GridView kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gi automatisk sortering, oppdatere og slette funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GridView control can provide support for sorting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For GridView kontrollen kan levere støtte for sortering, oppdatere og slette med andre typer datakilder.

trans-unit.source: However, you will need to provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger imidlertid gi en passende hendelsesbehandling implementering for disse operasjonene.

trans-unit.source: Sorting allows the user to sort the items in the GridView control with respect to a specific column by clicking on the column's header.
trans-unit.target: Sortering tillater brukeren å sortere elementene i GridView-kontrollen i forhold til en bestemt kolonne ved å klikke på den kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: To enable sorting, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowSorting%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere sortering, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowSorting%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatic updating, deleting, and selection functionalities are enabled when a button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> column field, with a command name of "Edit", "Delete", and "Select", respectively, is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk oppdatering, slette og valg funksjonaliteten aktiveres når en knapp i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>kolonnefelt, med et kommandonavn "Rediger", "Delete" og "Velg" henholdsvis klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: The GridView control can automatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> column field with an Edit, Delete, or Select button if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateSelectButton%2A> property is set to `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: GridView-kontrollen kan automatisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>kolonnen feltet med Rediger, Slett, eller velg-knappen hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateSelectButton%2A>er satt til `true`henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateSelectButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Inserting records into the data source is not directly supported by the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innsetting poster i datakilden direkte støttes ikke av GridView-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to insert records by using the GridView control in conjunction with the `DetailsView` or `FormView` control.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å sette inn poster ved å bruke GridView sammen med den `DetailsView` eller `FormView` kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the GridView control can automatically break the records up into pages.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å vise alle poster i datakilden samtidig, kan GridView-kontrollen automatisk dele oppføringene opp i sider.

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere Bla, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GridView control is re-created on postback based on the information that is stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For GridView kontrollen er gjenopprettet på tilbakesending basert på informasjonen som lagres i <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the GridView control includes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A> property set to `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A> property must also be set to `true` to ensure that concurrent data operations, such as updates and deletes, apply to the appropriate row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis GridView kontrollen inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true`, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A>egenskapen må også settes til `true` å sikre at dataene samtidige operasjoner, for eksempel oppdatering og sletting, gjelder riktig rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: ## Customizing the User Interface You can customize the appearance of the GridView control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: ## Tilpasse bruker grensesnittet du kan tilpasse utseendet til GridView-kontroll ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the alternating data rows in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for vekslende datarader GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the row being edited in the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the GridView control when the data source does not contain any records.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer row of the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header row of the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>|The style settings for the pager row of the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data rows in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, vises dataradene veksling mellom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>-Innstillinger og innstillinger for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for raden redigeres GridView kontrollens. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for tom dataraden vises i kontrollen GridView når datakilden ikke inneholder noen poster. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunntekstraden kontrollens GridView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for overskriftsraden kontrollens GridView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for raden personsøker kontrollens GridView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for datarader GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the selected row in the GridView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingCellStyle%2A>|The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>også er angitt, vises dataradene veksling mellom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>-Innstillinger og innstillinger for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for den valgte raden GridView kontrollens. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingCellStyle%2A>| Stilen innstillingen for kolonnen dataene er sortert etter GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in ascending order.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingHeaderStyle%2A>|The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne stilen angis, brukes (for eksempel merkede kolonnen) stilen til celler når dataene er sortert i stigende rekkefølge. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingHeaderStyle%2A>| Stilen innstillingen for kolonnen dataene er sortert etter GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedAscendingHeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this style is set, an arrow indicating the data is sorted ascending is placed on the header of the GridView control when the data is sorted in ascending order.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingCellStyle%2A>|The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne stilen er angitt, en pil som angir dataene er sortert stigende plasseres i hodet kontrollens GridView når dataene er sortert i stigende rekkefølge. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingCellStyle%2A>| Stilen innstillingen for kolonnen dataene er sortert etter GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in descending order.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingHeaderStyle%2A>|The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne stilen angis, brukes (for eksempel merkede kolonnen) stilen til celler når dataene er sortert i synkende rekkefølge. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingHeaderStyle%2A>| Stilen innstillingen for kolonnen dataene er sortert etter GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortedDescendingHeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this style is set, an arrow pointing down is placed on the header of the GridView when the data is sorted in descending order.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne stilen er angitt, en pil ned plasseres i hodet i GridView når dataene er sortert i synkende rekkefølge. | Du kan også vise eller skjule ulike delene av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskaper som styrer hvilke deler vises eller skjules.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||Shows or hides the footer section of the GridView control.| ||Shows or hides the header section of the GridView control.| ## Events The GridView control provides several events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | | Viser eller skjuler bunnteksten kontrollens GridView. | | | Viser eller skjuler delen hodet kontrollens GridView. | ## Hendelser i GridView kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan programmer mot.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kjører en egendefinert rutine når det oppstår en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that are supported by the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som støttes av GridView-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the GridView control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker klikkes, men når kontrollen GridView behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the GridView control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis når du trenger å utføre en oppgave når brukeren navigerer til en annen side i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker klikkes, men før GridView behandler kontrollen Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>|Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the GridView control exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen Bla. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>| Forekommer når en rad Avbryt-knappen, men før GridView-kontrollen avslutter redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>|Occurs when a button is clicked in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å stoppe operasjonen annullering. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>| Forekommer når brukeren klikker en knapp i GridView-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>|Occurs when a new row is created in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen ofte brukes til å utføre en oppgave når brukeren klikker en knapp i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>| Forekommer når en ny rad opprettes GridView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is created.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>|Occurs when a data row is bound to data in the GridView control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å endre innholdet i en rad når raden opprettes. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>| Forekommer når en datarad er bundet til data i GridView-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is bound to data.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>|Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the GridView control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å endre innholdet i en rad når raden er bundet til data. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>| Forekommer når en rad Delete-knappen, men når kontrollen GridView sletter oppføringen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>|Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the GridView control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av sletteoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>| Forekommer når en rad Delete-knappen, men før GridView kontrollen sletter fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>|Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the GridView control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen sletting. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>| Forekommer når en rad Rediger-knappen, men før GridView kontrollen går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>|Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the GridView control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte redigeringsoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>| Forekommer når du klikker oppdateringsknappen for en rad, men når kontrollen GridView oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>|Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the GridView control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av oppdateringen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>| Forekommer når en rad oppdateringsknappen klikkes, men kontrollen oppdateres før GridView raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>|Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the GridView control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte oppdatering. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en rad Select-knappen, men når kontrollen GridView behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task after a row is selected in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>|Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the GridView control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å utføre en etter en rad er valgt i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en rad Select-knappen, men kontrollen behandler operasjonen select før GridView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the selection operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>|Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the GridView control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte valgoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>| Forekommer når den hyperkoblingen sortere en kolonne, men når kontrollen GridView behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>|Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the GridView control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å utføre en når brukeren klikker en hyperkobling hvis du vil sortere en kolonne. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>| Forekommer når den hyperkoblingen sortere en kolonne, men før GridView behandler kontrollen sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte sorteringsoperasjonen eller til å utføre en egendefinert sortering rutine. | ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a container control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll på en side, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>objekt, angi egenskapene for og deretter legge den til <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen for en beholderkontroll, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> dynamisk

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om egendefinerte Bla er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Paging enables you to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in chunks.
trans-unit.target: Bla gjør det mulig å vise innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i biter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of items on a page is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer på en side fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally, every row in the data source is read every time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control moves to a different page.
trans-unit.target: Hver rad i datakilden er vanligvis lese hver gang de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen flytter til en annen side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This can consume a lot of resources when the total number of items in the data source is very large.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan bruke mye ressurser når antall elementer i datakilden er svært.

trans-unit.source: Custom paging allows you to read just the items you need for a single page from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert Bla kan du lese elementer du trenger ett ark fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: To enable custom paging, set both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> and AllowCustomPaging properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere egendefinerte Bla, setter du både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>og AllowCustomPaging egenskaper for `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property to the new page index value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A> property to the total number of items in the data source, set the data source to return only the rows needed for the current page, and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>hendelse, angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>til den nye indeksverdien siden sette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A>til totalt antall elementer i datakilden, sette datakilden til å returnere bare rader som trengs for gjeldende side, og Ring den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A> property enables the control to determine the total number of pages; this value is normally determined automatically by reading all of the items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A>egenskapen kan kontrollen ikke fastsette det totale antallet sider; denne vanligvis bestemmes verdien automatisk ved å lese alle elementene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.VirtualItemCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egendefinerte Bla er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om Bla-funksjonen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can automatically break the records up into pages.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å vise alle poster i datakilden samtidig, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan automatisk dele oppføringene opp i sidene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the data source supports the paging capability, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can take advantage of that and provide built-in paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden støtter Bla-funksjonen i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av som og angi innebygd Bla funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface or a data source that supports paging capability.
trans-unit.target: Bla-funksjonen kan bare brukes med alle datakildeobjektet som støtter det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet eller en datakilde som støtter Bla.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To enable the paging feature, set the AllowPaging property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere funksjonen Bla egenskapen AllowPaging til `true`.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays 10 records on a page at a time.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>viser kontrollen 10 poster på en side om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can change the number of records displayed on a page by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre antall poster som vises på en side ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of pages required to display the data source contents, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å finne det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise datakilde innholdet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine the index of the currently displayed page by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå indeksen for den viste siden ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert, vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre sider.

trans-unit.source: You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text labels) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere innstillingene for raden personsøker (for eksempel personsøker visningsmodus, antall siden koblinger skal vises på et tidspunkt og personsøker kontrollens tekstetiketter) ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker kan vises på toppen, bunn, eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Position%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also select from one of four built-in pager display modes by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også velge blant fire innebygde personsøker visningsmodus ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Mode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the built-in display modes.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver innebygde visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `PagerButton.NextPrevious`| Et sett med paginering kontroller som består av forrige eller neste knappene. | | `PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`| Et sett med paginering kontroller som består av forrige, neste første og siste knapp. | | `PagerButton.Numeric`| Et sett med paginering kontroller som består av nummererte koblingen knapper til tilgang sider direkte.

trans-unit.source: This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardmodus. | | `PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`| Et sett med paginering kontroller som består av nummererte og første og siste koblingen knappene. | For å styre utseendet til raden personsøker (inkludert bakgrunnsfarge, skriftfarge og posisjon), kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains only one page of records.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen skjuler automatisk personsøker raden når datakilden inneholder bare én side med oppføringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also enables you to define a custom template for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen også mulig å definere en egendefinert mal for raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a custom pager row template, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en egendefinert personsøker rad-mal, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når Bla oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis når du trenger å utføre en oppgave når brukeren navigerer til en annen side i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen Bla. |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paging feature is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis funksjonen Bla er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the sorting feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om sortering funksjonen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports sorting is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sorting functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter sortering er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk sortering funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically, you must provide the sorting functionality by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen programmatisk, du må oppgi sortering funksjonaliteten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Different data sources have different requirements for enabling their sorting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Forskjellige datakilder har ulike krav for å aktivere sortering funksjonene.

trans-unit.source: To determine the requirements, see the documentation for the specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne kravene, kan du se dokumentasjonen for den aktuelle datakilden.

trans-unit.source: To enable sorting, set the AllowSorting property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere sortering, angi AllowSorting egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled, the heading text for each column field with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> property set is displayed as a link button.
trans-unit.target: Når sortering er aktivert, overskriftsteksten for hvert kolonnefelt med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>egenskapen angitt vises som en kobling-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> property for an automatically generated columns field is automatically populated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>for en automatisk generert kolonnefeltet fylles ut automatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define your own columns through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> property for each column; otherwise, the column will not display the link button in the header.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du definerer din egen kolonnene gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samling, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>egenskapen for hver kolonne; ellers kolonnen vises ikke koble i overskriften.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the link button for a column causes the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to be sorted based on the sort expression.
trans-unit.target: Å klikke koblingen for en kolonne fører til at elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen skal sorteres basert på Sorteringsuttrykket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the sort expression is simply the name of the field displayed in the column, which causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to sort with respect to that column.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket er vanligvis ganske enkelt navnet på feltet vises i kolonnen som fører til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen skal sorteres i forhold til kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To sort by multiple fields, use a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sortere etter flere felt, kan du bruke et sorteringsuttrykk som inneholder en kommadelt liste over feltnavn.

trans-unit.source: You can determine the sort expression that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is applying by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå Sorteringsuttrykket som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>bruker en kontroll ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a column's link button repeatedly toggles the sort direction between ascending and descending order.
trans-unit.target: Knappen en kolonne koblingen flere ganger veksler sorteringsretningen mellom stigende og synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: To determine the current sort direction, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne den gjeldende sorteringsretningen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when sorting occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når sortering oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>|Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>| Forekommer når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>|Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å utføre en når brukeren klikker en hyperkobling hvis du vil sortere en kolonne. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>| Forekommer når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte sorteringsoperasjonen eller til å utføre en egendefinert sortering rutine. |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sorting feature is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis funksjonen sorteres er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of alternating data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som gjør det mulig å definere loddrette datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingRowStyle property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AlternatingRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet loddrette datarader i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the AlternatingRowStyle settings.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, vises dataradene veksling mellom den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>Innstillinger og innstillinger for AlternatingRowStyle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<AlternatingRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<AlternatingRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of alternating data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen loddrette datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether bound fields are automatically created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bundne felt opprettes automatisk for hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField> object is automatically created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateColumns er satt er satt til `true`, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField>objekt opprettes automatisk for hvert felt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then displayed as a column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt deretter vises som en kolonne i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i rekkefølgen som vises på feltene i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This option provides a convenient way to display every field in the data source; however, you have limited control of how an automatically generated column field is displayed or behaves.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er det enkelt å vise hvert felt i datakilden. du har imidlertid begrenset styre hvordan en automatisk generert kolonnefelt vises eller fungerer.

trans-unit.source: Instead of letting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically generate the column fields, you can manually define the column fields by setting the AutoGenerateColumns property to `false` and then creating a custom `Columns` collection.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for informerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen automatisk generering av kolonnefelter, kan du definere kolonnefeltene manuelt ved å sette egenskapen AutoGenerateColumns er satt til `false` og deretter opprette en egendefinert `Columns` samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In addition to bound column fields, you can also display a button column field, a check box column field, a command field, a hyperlink column field, an image field, or a column field based on your own custom-defined template.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til bundne kolonnefelter, kan du også vise et for kolonne-felt, et felt for merket kolonnen, command-feltet, en hyperkobling kolonne-feltet, et bildefelt eller et kolonnefelt basert på en egendefinert mal.

trans-unit.source: You can also combine explicitly declared column fields with automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kombinere eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelter med automatisk genererte kolonnefelter.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, gjengis eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelter først, etterfulgt av de automatisk genererte kolonnefeltene.

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated bound column fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk genererte bundne kolonnefelter er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A> property to a model type, <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> controls are generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `true` og angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>egenskapen modelltypen <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>Kontroller genereres.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A> property, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> controls are generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>Kontroller genereres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> controls, you have the following options: - Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A> property to `null` in the `Page_Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>kontroller, har følgende alternativer: - angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A>egenskapen `null` i den `Page_Load` hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: In that case, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> controls are generated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>Kontroller genereres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: - Write custom code to automatically generate fields by creating and assigning your own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A> class and assigning an instance of it to the control.
trans-unit.target: -Skriv egendefinert kode for å generere felt automatisk ved å opprette og tilordne en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A>klassen og tilordne en forekomst av den til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set AutoGenerateColumns to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Angi AutoGenerateColumns er satt `false`.
