trans-unit.source: In that case, no fields are generated, and you must manually specify fields using controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet ingen felt er generert, og du må angi felt ved hjelp av kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> manuelt

trans-unit.source: - Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Ikke angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> controls are generated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>Kontroller genereres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically create bound fields for each field in the data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til automatisk å opprette bundne felt for hvert felt i datakilden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with a Delete button for each data row is automatically added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Slett-knapp for hver datarad automatisk legges til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports deleting is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter sletting er bundet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk sletting funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a data source control to delete data, it must be configured to delete data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For datakildekontrollen slette data, må den konfigureres for å slette data.

trans-unit.source: To configure a data source control to delete records, see the documentation for the specific data source control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil konfigurere en datakilde-kontroll for å slette poster, kan du se dokumentasjonen for bestemte datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateDeleteButton property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object) with a Delete button for each data row is automatically added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateDeleteButton er satt til `true`, en kolonne (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objektet) med en Slett-knapp for hvert rad automatisk legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Delete button for a row permanently removes that record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Klikke Slett for en rad permanent fjerner denne oppføring fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to identify the key field or fields of the data source for the automatic deleting feature to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>til å identifisere felt eller felt for datakilden for automatisk sletting funksjoner skal fungere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en rad er slettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>|Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>| Forekommer når en rad Delete knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter oppføringen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>|Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av sletteoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>| Forekommer når en rad Delete knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter oppføringen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen sletting. |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically add a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with a Delete button for each data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatisk legge til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Delete-knapp for hver datarad, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with an Edit button for each data row is automatically added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Rediger-knappen for hver datarad automatisk legges til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter oppdatering er bundet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk oppdatering funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a data source control to update data, it must be configured to update data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Datakildekontroll til å oppdatere data, den må konfigureres for å oppdatere dataene.

trans-unit.source: To configure a data source control to update records, see the documentation for the specific data source control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil konfigurere en datakilde-kontroll for å oppdatere poster, kan du se dokumentasjonen for bestemte datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateEditButton property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object) with an Edit button for each data row is automatically added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateEditButton er satt til `true`, en kolonne (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objektet) med en Rediger-knappen for hvert rad automatisk legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking an Edit button for a row puts that row in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Klikk Rediger-knappen for en rad sette denne raden i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: When a row is in edit mode, each column field in the row that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, for the field's data type.
trans-unit.target: Når en rad i redigeringsmodus, hver kolonnefelt i rad som ikke er skrivebeskyttet viser den aktuelle inndataene kontrollen som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll for feltets datatype.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to modify the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar brukeren å endre verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker, erstattes Rediger også med en Oppdater-knappen og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the row in the data source with any value changes and returns the row to display mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker oppdateringsknappen oppdaterer raden i datakilden med verdiendringer og returnerer raden for å vise modus.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the row to display mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker Avbryt opphever økten verdiendringer og returnerer raden for å vise modus.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically put a row in edit mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property with the index of the row.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan sette en rad i redigeringsmodus programmatisk ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>egenskap med indeksen i raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically exit edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avslutte programmatisk redigeringsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>egenskapen til-1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the built-in updating functionality, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property with a comma-separated list of field names to identify the primary key field or fields of the data source; otherwise, the built-in updating functionality will not be able to update the correct record.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker innebygd oppdaterer funksjonalitet, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskap med en kommadelt liste over felt navngir til å identifisere det primære nøkkelfeltet eller feltene i datakilden; ellers innebygde oppdaterer funksjonaliteten vil ikke kunne oppdatere riktig posten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically ensures that the automatically generated field columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Når ved hjelp av automatisk generert feltet kolonnene (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>egenskapen `true`), <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen automatisk sørger for at de automatisk genererte feltet kolonnene som svarer til feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of a row that is in edit mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet til en rad som er i redigeringsmodus ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is updated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en rad er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>|Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control cancels out of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>| Forekommer når en rad Avbryt-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen avbryter utenfor redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>|Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å stoppe operasjonen annullering. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>| Forekommer når en rad Rediger-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll registrerer redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>|Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte redigeringsoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>| Forekommer når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>|Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av oppdateringen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>| Forekommer når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte oppdatering. |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically add a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with an Edit button for each data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatisk legge til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Rediger-knappen for hver datarad, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with a Select button for each data row is automatically added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Select-knapp for hver datarad automatisk legges til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateSelectButton property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object) with a Select button for each data row is automatically added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateSelectButton er satt til `true`, en kolonne (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objektet) med en Select-knapp for hvert rad automatisk legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Select button for a row selects that row in the control, which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Å klikke Velg for en rad velger denne raden i kontrollen som angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen indeksen i raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the selected row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer den valgte raden, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: You can also get the primary key value for the selected record by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også få primærnøkkelen for den valgte posten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property contains the values of the key fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>egenskapen inneholder verdier for nøkkelfeltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically select a row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Programmatisk kan du velge en rad ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection of a row, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte valg av en rad, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen til-1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the selected row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet til den valgte raden ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is selected.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en rad er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>|Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en rad Select knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task after a row is selected in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>|Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å utføre en etter en rad er valgt i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en rad Select knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the selecting operation.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen valg. |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically add a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field column with a Select button for each data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatisk legge til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> field-kolonnen med en Select knapp for hver datarad, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BackImageUrl-egenskapen til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the image is tiled to fill in the background.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det angitte bildet er mindre enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>side ved side kontroll, bildet slik at det fyller i bakgrunnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the control, the image is cropped.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet er større enn kontrollen, beskjæres bildet.

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the bottom pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre sider, og kan vises på toppen, nederst eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BottomPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BottomPagerRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The BottomPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I BottomPagerRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter nederste personsøker rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk nederste personsøker rad, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the BottomPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen BottomPagerRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the bottom pager row in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: Use the Caption property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen tittel til å angi teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse av tabellen som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the position at which to render the HTML caption element by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi plasseringen der skal gjengi HTML teksten-elementet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett eller loddrett posisjonen for elementet HTML teksten i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: Use the CaptionAlign property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CaptionAlign-egenskapen til å angi vannrett eller loddrett posisjonen for elementet HTML teksten i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulige verdier.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`|The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Left`|The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`|The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Right`|The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Top`|The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| > [!NOTE] > When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med nederst i tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Left`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med til venstre i tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`| Justering for elementet teksten er ikke angitt. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Right`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med høyre side av tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Top`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med øverst i tabellen. | > [!NOTE] > Når denne egenskapen er satt til `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, brukes standardverdien for nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: To specify the text for the HTML caption element, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du angir teksten for elementet HTML-teksten, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>, which uses the browser's default setting.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>, som bruker leserens standardinnstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen CellPadding for å kontrollere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling angitt legges til alle sidene i cellen.

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: Alle celler i den samme kolonnen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen ha samme bredde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling brukes på den største cellen og alle celler i kolonnen har cellebredden denne.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte har alle celler i den samme raden samme høyde.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling brukes på den høyeste cellen i raden og alle celler i raden har denne cellehøyden.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler størrelser kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass, i piksler mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CellSpacing-egenskapen for å kontrollere avstanden mellom tilstøtende celler i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Denne avstand brukes både loddrett og vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden celle er uniform for hele kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler avstanden mellom rader eller kolonner kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du vil angi denne egenskapen til en verdi større enn 0 og deretter angir du <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>egenskapen til en verdi som viser cellekantlinjer, et hull vises mellom kantlinjer sammenhengende celleområde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.CellSpacing%2A> property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.CellSpacing%2A>egenskapen kontrollerer størrelsen på avstanden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.CellSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass, i piksler mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the data fields whose values are appended to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> property value to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnene på feltene som inneholder verdiene legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>egenskapsverdien identifiserer hver forekomst av en databundet-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, ASP.NET generates a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value for each instance.
trans-unit.target: Å hindre navnekonflikter når flere forekomster av en kontroll gjengis i flere rader i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, ASP.NET genererer en unik <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>verdi for hver forekomst.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You specify how the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is generated by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du angi hvordan <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>verdien genereres ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode>, ASP.NET will generate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field or fields that are specified in ClientIDRowSuffix.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode>, ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>ved å legge til en suffiks som er avledet fra datafeltet eller feltene som er angitt i ClientIDRowSuffix.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ClientIDRowSuffix is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ClientIDRowSuffix ikke er angitt, er suffikset et serienummer.

trans-unit.source: The names of the data fields whose values are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Navnene på feltene som inneholder verdiene brukes til å identifisere hver forekomst av en databundet kontroll når ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataverdiene som brukes til å identifisere hver forekomst av en databundet kontroll når ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Dataverdiene som brukes til å identifisere hver forekomst av en databundet kontroll når ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> objects that represent the column fields in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekter som representerer kolonnefelter i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A column field represents a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Et kolonnefelt representerer en kolonne i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The Columns property (collection) is used to store all the explicitly declared column fields that get rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kolonner (samlingen) brukes til å lagre alle eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelt som få gjengis i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Columns collection to programmatically manage the collection of column fields.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke samlingen kolonner programmatisk administrere samlingen av kolonnefelt.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared column fields can be used in combination with automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarert kolonne kan brukes sammen med automatisk genererte kolonnefelter.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, gjengis eksplisitt deklarerte kolonnefelter først, etterfulgt av de automatisk genererte kolonnefeltene.

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated column fields are not added to the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk generert felt er ikke lagt til i samlingen kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The column fields are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the column fields appear in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnefeltene som skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i rekkefølgen som kolonnefeltene vises i samlingen kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different column field classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class and can be used in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen kolonne feltet klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>klasse og kan brukes i samlingen kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: |Column field type|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Feltet kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard kolonnetypen kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>| Viser en kommandoknapp for hvert element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å opprette en kolonne med egendefinerte knappekontroller, for eksempel Legg til eller fjern. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>| Viser en avmerkingsboks for hvert element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen brukes vanligvis til å vise felt med en boolsk verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>| Viser forhåndsdefinert kommandoknappene for å utføre Velg, redigere eller slette operasjoner. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen gjør det mulig å binde andre felt til hyperkoblingen URL-adresse. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>| Viser et bilde for hvert element i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>| Viser en brukerdefinert innhold for hvert element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, i henhold til en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| Although you can programmatically add column fields to the Columns collection, it is easier to list the column fields declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of each column field to show or hide each column field.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen felttypen lar deg opprette et egendefinert kolonnefelt. | Selv om du kan legge til kolonnefelter programmatisk i samlingen kolonner, er det enklere å vise kolonnefelter deklarativt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>for hver kolonnefelt å vise eller skjule hvert kolonnefelt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskap for et kolonnen er satt til `false`, kolonnen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen og data for kolonnen gjør ikke en tur til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at dataene for en kolonne som ikke er synlig for å gjøre en tur-retur, kan du legge til feltnavnet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"></xref> that contains all the column fields in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle kolonnefeltene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that will automatically generate the columns for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kontrollen som automatisk genererer kolonner for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll som bruker ASP.NET dynamiske funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: In order to use ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in a page, you must add a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: For å kunne bruke ASP.NET dynamiske funksjoner i en side, må du legge til en <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>

trans-unit.source: This enables ASP.NET Dynamic Data features for data-bound controls in a page, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for ASP.NET dynamiske funksjoner for databundet kontroller på en side som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To enable an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to use Dynamic Data features, you must associate it with the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> control by calling the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method during the `Page_Init` event.
trans-unit.target: Aktivere en individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer for å bruke funksjonene for dynamisk, må du knytte den med den <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>kontrollen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden under den `Page_Init` hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method automatically sets the ColumnsGenerator property to the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir automatisk ColumnsGenerator-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>objektet.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>

trans-unit.source: The control that will automatically generate the columns for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som automatisk genererer kolonner for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll som bruker ASP.NET dynamiske funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: Creates an automatically generated column field.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en automatisk generert kolonnefelt.

trans-unit.source: The CreateAutoGeneratedColumn method is used to create an automatically generated column field when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: CreateAutoGeneratedColumn metoden brukes til å opprette en automatisk generert kolonne feltet når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the automatically generated column field are specified through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties> object contained in the `fieldProperties` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for kolonnefeltet automatisk genererte angis via den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties>objekt i den `fieldProperties` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"></xref> that represents the properties of the automatically generated column field to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"> </xref> som representerer egenskapene for de automatisk genererte kolonnefeltet for å opprette.

trans-unit.source: An that represents the automatically generated column field specified by the fieldProperties parameter.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer kolonnefeltet automatisk genererte som er angitt av den fieldProperties parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control using the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter kontrollen hierarkiet brukes til å gjengi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollere ved hjelp av den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method is used to create the control hierarchy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden av CreateChildControls brukes til å opprette kontrollen hierarkiet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the data source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder datakilden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the child controls are bound to data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at underordnede kontroller er bundet til data. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows created.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: dataSource returns a null .
trans-unit.target: dataSourceReturnerer null .

trans-unit.source: -or- dataSource does not implement the interface and cannot return a .
trans-unit.target: - eller - dataSource implementerer ikke den grensesnittet og kan ikke returnere en .

trans-unit.source: -or- is and dataSource does not implement the interface and cannot perform data source paging.
trans-unit.target: - eller - er og dataSource implementerer ikke det grensesnittet og kan ikke utføre datakilde Bla.

trans-unit.source: -or- dataSource does not implement the interface and dataBinding is set to .
trans-unit.target: - eller - dataSource implementerer ikke den grensesnittet og dataBinding er satt til .

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child table.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny underordnet tabell.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildTable method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create a child table.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateChildTable er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette en underordnet tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Always returns a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> that represents the child table.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en ny <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"> </xref> som representerer den underordnede tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of column fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter settet med kolonnefelt som brukes til å bygge kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, a bound column field is automatically created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>er satt til `true`, et felt i bundne kolonnen opprettes automatisk for hvert felt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each bound column field is then displayed as a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt for bundne kolonnen deretter vises som en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i rekkefølgen som vises på feltene i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The CreateColumns method is used to create the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateColumns brukes til å opprette de automatisk genererte kolonnefeltene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> som representerer datakilden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the data source specified by the `dataSource` parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke datakilden som er angitt av den `dataSource` parameteren; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder felt som brukes til å bygge kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: Creates the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter standardstilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is used to create the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlStyle brukes til å opprette standardstilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the style for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som representerer stilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source for processing.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt som inneholder argumenter få sendt til datakilden for behandling.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that contains the arguments passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataSourceSelectArguments er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt som inneholder argumentene ble sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object contains the arguments for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: I denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objektet inneholder argumentene for sidevekslingsoperasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> som inneholder argumenter få sendt til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Creates a row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en rad i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateRow method is used to create a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateRow brukes til å opprette en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A data-bound <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically generates the rows needed to display the target data.
trans-unit.target: En databundet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen automatisk genererer rader som trengs for å vise måldataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to create.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source item to bind to the row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kildetabellen elementet skal bindes til raden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> created using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> opprettet ved hjelp av de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden for binding av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden Databinde til å binde data fra en datakilde for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden løser alle databinding uttrykk i den aktive malen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method is called automatically if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control refers to a valid data source control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Databinde kalles automatisk hvis de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen refererer til en gyldig datakilde-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of manually calling the DataBind method, you can use model binding with your DataBind control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of a method that returns data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for manuelt å kalle metoden Databinde, kan du bruke bindingen for modellen med Databinde-kontroll ved å sette <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>egenskapen til navnet på en metode som returnerer data for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>deretter automatisk fylles ut med dataene som er returnert av metoden select.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Model binding can simplify your code for working with data.
trans-unit.target: Modellen binding kan forenkle koden for arbeid med data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [modellen Binding og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene i primærnøkkelen for elementer som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen DataKeyNames til å angi feltet eller feltene som representerer primærnøkkelen for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row.
trans-unit.target: Du må bare angi denne egenskapen til feltet eller felt som må identifiserer hver rad; ID-kolonnen hvis et heltall verdi unikt identifiserer for eksempel hver rad.

trans-unit.source: You must set the DataKeyNames property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi egenskapen DataKeyNames for tilbudene for automatisk oppdatering og slette funksjonene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen ikke virker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i disse nøkkelfeltene som er sendt til datakildekontrollen for å angi raden for å oppdatere eller slette.

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente dataene nøkkelverdi ved oppdatering eller sletting av rader, bruker du `Keys` -egenskapen for enten <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event handler.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `e.Keys[0]` inneholder verdien for den første data-nøkkelen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å hente data nøkkelverdien når en rad velges, må du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen DataKeyNames angis, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen automatisk fyller ut den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>samling med verdiene fra det angitte feltet eller felt, som gir en enkel måte å få tilgang til primærnøkler for hver rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores these key field values in the control state.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll lagrer disse feltverdier tilstanden kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse verdiene inneholder sensitiv informasjon, det anbefales at du aktiverer visningsstatus kryptering ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>egenskapen `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the DataKeyNames property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker automatisk generert feltet kolonnene (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>egenskapen `true`), <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sikrer at kolonnene som samsvarer med feltet eller feltene som er angitt i egenskapen DataKeyNames er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskap for et kolonnen er satt til `false`, kolonnen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen og data for kolonnen gjør ikke en tur til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the DataKeyNames property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at dataene for en kolonne som ikke er synlig skal være tilgjengelige for klienten, kan du legge til navnet på feltet i egenskapen DataKeyNames.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
