trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder navnet på den primære nøkkelen felt for elementer som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> objekter som representerer dataene nøkkelverdi for hver rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for hver rad i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object contains the values of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet inneholder verdiene i feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's DataKeys collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekter legges deretter til kontrollens DataKeys-samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeys property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataKeys-egenskapen til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for en bestemt datarad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the currently selected row.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for gjeldende rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>til å hente data nøkkelverdien for gjeldende rad direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> that contains the data key of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"> </xref> som inneholder datanøkkelen for hver rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden for å kalle for å slette data.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen fører til at modellen binding som skal brukes som metoden databinding.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Sletter oppføringen i den angitte indeksen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DeleteRow method to programmatically delete the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DeleteRow-metoden til å slette programmatisk post i den angitte indeksen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å slette en oppføring fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for dataene.

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to does not support delete operations, or there is no delete command defined for the data source.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kontrollere som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til støtter ikke sletting, eller det finnes ingen delete-kommando som er angitt for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen i raden vil redigere.

trans-unit.source: The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero).
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen er nullbasert (den første raden er rad null).

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events: - You want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis bare i følgende situasjoner, som omfatter behandlingsprogrammer for bestemte hendelser:-du vil bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen åpne i redigeringsmodus for en bestemt rad første gang siden vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can set the EditIndex property in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class or of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi egenskapen EditIndex i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>hendelse av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>klassen eller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: - You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated.
trans-unit.target: -Du vil vite raden ble redigert etter at raden ble oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du hente radindeksen fra egenskapen EditIndex i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: - You are binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: -Du binder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case you must set the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må du angi EditIndex-egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: If you set the EditIndex property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control might not enter edit mode for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter egenskapen EditIndex etter en tilbakesending eller behandlingsprogrammer for hendelser som aktiveres senere enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>hendelsen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan ikke angi redigeringsmodus for den angitte raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du lese verdien for denne egenskapen i andre hendelsesbehandling, garanteres ikke indeksen for å gjenspeile raden som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Ikke fastsette som rad brukeren har trykket en **Rediger** knapp eller en hyperkobling i før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll registrerer redigeringsmodus, kan du hente radindeks fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Slik at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i å angi redigeringsmodus når en bruker har trykket en **Rediger** knappen eller hyperkobling, Sett den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>objekt `true` i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden vil redigere.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at ingen rad redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte indeksen er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the row selected for editing in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til raden som er merket for redigering i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EditRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til raden blir redigert i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<EditRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the row being edited in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for raden blir redigert i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet av tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the null row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til null rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Raden null vises når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that enables you to set the appearance of the null row.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som lar deg angi utseendet til raden null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved hjelp av egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for tom dataraden først plasseres `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt bruke innebygde Brukergrensesnittet for tom dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du får programmatisk tilgang kontroller du deklarerer i en tom mal, kan du se [slik: tilgang serverkontroller med ID](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>og EmptyDataTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for den tomme dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan alternativt definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge EmptyDataText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en validerer kontroll håndterer unntak som oppstår under innsetting eller oppdater operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en validerer kontroll håndterer unntak som oppstår under Sett inn eller oppdatere operasjoner. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valg av en rad er basert på indeksen eller data nøkkelverdier.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false` and a row is selected, the same row is selected when a new page is displayed even though the new page has different data in it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `false` og en rad velges, samme rad velges når en ny side vises, selv om den nye siden har ulike data i den.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, when you display a page that has different data in it, no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `true`når du viser en side som har ulike data i det ingen rad er valgt.

trans-unit.source: If you then return to the page on which a row was selected, that row is still selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du deretter tilbake til side som en rad er valgt, er fortsatt denne raden valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rad utvalget er basert på data for verdier. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callbacks are used for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om klientsiden tilbakeringinger brukes til sortering og bla operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: By default, when a sorting or paging operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control posts back to the server to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når en sortering eller bla operasjon er utført, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen legger tilbake til serveren for å utføre operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks property is set to `true`, a service is called on the client to perform sorting and paging operations, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks er satt til `true`, en tjeneste kalles på klienten til å utføre sortering og sidevekslingsoperasjoner som trenger post-tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke alle lesere støtter denne funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a browser supports this feature, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå om en nettleser støtter denne funksjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: All columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection must support callbacks for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: Alle kolonner i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen må støtte tilbakeringinger for denne funksjonen til å fungere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen inneholder en kolonne som ikke støtter tilbakeringinger, slik som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>Unntak oppstår.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke klientsiden tilbakeringinger for sortering og sidevekslingsoperasjoner; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>samlingen inneholder en kolonne som ikke støtter tilbakeringinger, slik som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the specified row and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdier for hvert felt som er angitt i den angitte raden og lagrer dem i den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractRowValues er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen for å hente verdiene for hvert felt som er deklarert i rad som er angitt av den `row` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om de utpakkede verdiene inkluderer skrivebeskyttede felt og nøkkelfelt ved hjelp av den `includeReadOnlyFields` og `includePrimaryKey` parametere, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> brukes til å lagre feltverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> from which to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> skal hentes feltverdiene fra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere skrivebeskyttet felt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere felt eller feltene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FooterRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I FooterRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter bunntekst rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk bunntekstraden for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen FooterRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<FooterStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på bunnteksten rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer resultatet av en tilbakeringing hendelse som er rettet mot en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>til å hente data og GetCallbackResult-metoden til å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen asynkront.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter tilbakeringing skriptet for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: The GetCallbackScript method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetCallbackScript er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette tilbakeringing skriptet for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: Knappekontrollen som skal opprettes tilbakeringing skriptet.

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter som sendes til tilbakeringing skriptet.

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Skriptet tilbakeringing for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rutenettstilen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk rutenettlinjene-egenskapen til å angi rutenett-stil for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige stiler.

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: | Stilen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `GridLines.None`| Ingen rutenettlinjene skal vises. | | `GridLines.Horizontal`| Viser de vannrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Vertical`| Viser de loddrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Both`| Viser både vannrette og loddrette rutenettlinjene. |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HeaderRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I HeaderRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter overskriftsrad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk overskriftsraden, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the HeaderRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen HeaderRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<HeaderStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett justering av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HorizontalAlign-egenskapen til å angi vannrett justering av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen vannrett justering stiler.

trans-unit.source: |Alignment value|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: | Justering verdien | Beskrivelse | |---------------------|-----------------| | `HorizontalAlign.NotSet`| Vannrett justering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er ikke angitt. | | `HorizontalAlign.Left`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Kontrollen er venstrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Center`| Kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>midt på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Right`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Kontrollen er høyrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Justify`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er justert med både venstre og høyre Marge av siden. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is used to initialize the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializePager brukes til å initialisere raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the pager row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer personsøker raden som skal starte.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns the pager row should span.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner personsøker raden skal span.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> som representerer datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en rad i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeRow method is used to initialize a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeRow brukes til å initialisere en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer raden som skal starte.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> objects that represent the column fields in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekter som representerer kolonnefelter i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om angitt datatype kan være bundet til en kolonne i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method that is commonly used by control developers to programmatically determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsBindableType er helper metoden brukes vanligvis av kontrollutviklere å programmatisk bestemme om den angitte datatypen kan være bundet til en kolonne i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control: - <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control: - <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to test.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> som representerer datatypen for å teste.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis angitt datatype kan være bundet til en kolonne i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll som må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å laste statusen til egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder lagrede kontrollverdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om hendelsen for kontrollen for Web-server blir sendt sidens bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The OnBubbleEvent method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBubbleEvent implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden til å sende hendelser fra underordnede kontroller siden hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen ble avbrutt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Rebinds den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen dataene etter den <> </> *>, <> </> *>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>-egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind the control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataPropertyChanged er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen binde kontrollen til dataene etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>-egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged varsler en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen som er endret i den underliggende datakilden, og at kontrollen skal binde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kalles når en egenskap for datakildevisningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: Når varslet av denne metoden, må server webkontroller utføre initialisering trinn som kreves for å opprette og konfigurere en forekomst.

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's View state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: I denne fasen av server kontrollens levetid må kontrollens visningsstatus ennå fylles ut.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du tilgang til andre serverkontroller når denne metoden kalles, uavhengig om det er en underordnet eller overordnet til denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: Andre serverkontroller garanteres ikke opprettet og for tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>denne hendelsen oppstår når du klikker Avbryt-knappen for en rad i redigeringsmodus, men før raden avslutter redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel hvis den kan sette inn raden i en uønsket tilstand, når denne hendelsen oppstår, stopper du Avbryt-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt må opprettes for hver rad i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når hver rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>

trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel legge til egendefinert innhold til en rad når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, hver rad i kontrollen må være bundet til en oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når en datarad (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet) er bundet til data i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel å endre verdiene i databundet til raden når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>denne hendelsen oppstår når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av oppdateringen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnRowUpdated method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnRowUpdated kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pages required to display the records of the data source in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet sider som kreves for å vise postene for datakilden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the PageCount property to determine the total number of pages required to display the records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), bruker du egenskapen PageCount for å finne det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise oppføringene i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>
