trans-unit.source: This value is calculated by dividing the total number of records in the data source by the number of records displayed in a page (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property) and rounding up.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien beregnes ved å dele antall poster i datakilden etter antall poster som vises i en side (som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>egenskapen) og avrunding. du</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pages in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Antallet sider i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for siden som vises.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the PageIndex property to determine the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), bruke egenskapen PageIndex til å bestemme indeksen for siden som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å endre programmatisk siden vises.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for siden som vises.

trans-unit.source: The PageIndex property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PageIndex er satt til en verdi mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The PageIndexChanged event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: PageIndexChanged-hendelsen oppstår når en av knappene personsøker, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel en egendefinert Bla-operasjon når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: For å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The PageIndexChanging event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: PageIndexChanging-hendelsen oppstår når en av knappene personsøker, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte operasjonen Bla når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren og å angi at operasjonen Bla bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte operasjonen Bla, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> object that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> objekt som gjør at du kan angi egenskaper for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerSettings property to control the settings of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerSettings-egenskapen for å kontrollere innstillingene for personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`) og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objektet (for eksempel `PagerSettings-Mode`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<PagerSettings>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<PagerSettings>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerStyle.Mode`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkluderer vanligvis raden personsøker visningsmodus og egendefinert tekst eller bilder for Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> som gjør at du kan angi egenskaper for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerStyle property to control the appearance of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`) og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<PagerStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<PagerStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A pager row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to true).
trans-unit.target: En personsøker rad vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>-egenskap er satt til true).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontrollene som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the PagerTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for innebygde personsøker rad-brukergrensesnittet (UI), kan du definere din egen Brukergrensesnittet ved hjelp av egenskapen PagerTemplate.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the PagerTemplate property is set, it overrides the built-in pager row UI.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når det PagerTemplate er satt, overstyrer den innebygde personsøker raden Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `<PagerTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for raden personsøker først plasseres `<PagerTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<PagerTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<PagerTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinere radverdiene personsøker, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er kontrollene lagt til personsøker malen til å utføre sidevekslingsoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen utfører en operasjon for Bla når knappekontrollen med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden" klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen `CommandArgument` egenskapen bestemmer hvilken type Bla å utføre operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command argument values supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser kommandoen argumentverdier som støttes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: |`CommandArgument` value|Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| |"Next"|Navigates to the next page.| |"Prev"|Navigates to the previous page.| |"First"|Navigates to the first page.| |"Last"|Navigates to the last page.| |Integer value|Navigates to the specified page number.|
trans-unit.target: | `CommandArgument` verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------------|-----------------| |" Neste "| Går til neste side. | |" Forrige "| Går til forrige side. | |" Første "| Går til den første siden. | |" Siste "| Navigerer til den siste siden. | | Heltallsverdien | Går til det angitte tallet. |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of records to display on a page in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall poster som skal vises på en side i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the PageSize property to specify the number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), bruke egenskapen PageSize til å angi antall poster som skal vises på én side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Antall poster som skal vises på én side.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 10.

trans-unit.source: The PageSize property is set to a value less than 1.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PageSize er satt til en verdi mindre enn 1.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Binding den angitte datakilden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen skal bindes den angitte datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that contains the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som inneholder datakilden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Establishes the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å opprette kontrollen hierarkiet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*> method.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>

trans-unit.source: The RaiseCallbackEvent method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseCallbackEvent er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer de aktuelle hendelsene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Kall siden den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>metoden når det oppstår en sende tilbake hendelse som starter de nødvendige hendelsene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kallet oppstår i livssyklusen siden etter innlasting og endre varsel er fullført, men før prerendering forekommer.

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert for å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>objekt for hendelsene som aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet hendelsen å opprette en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> hendelsen eller hendelser som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser server kontrollen webinnholdet til klientleseren parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse brukes til å gjengi server kontrollinnholdet til klientleseren parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> brukes til å gjengi server kontrollinnholdet på klientens nettleser.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når du klikker Avbryt-knappen for en rad i redigeringsmodus, men før raden avslutter redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The RowCancelingEdit event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: RowCancelingEdit-hendelsen oppstår når du klikker Avbryt-knappen for en rad i redigeringsmodus, men før raden avslutter redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel hvis den kan sette inn raden i en uønsket tilstand, når denne hendelsen oppstår, stopper du Avbryt-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for den gjeldende raden og å angi at Avbryt-operasjonen skal stoppes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To stop the cancel operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil stoppe Avbryt-operasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The RowCommand event is raised when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: Knapper i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll kan også aktivere noen av de innebygde funksjonene kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: For å utføre en av disse operasjonene, angitt i `CommandName` -egenskapen til en knapp til en av verdiene i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |`CommandName` value|Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: | `CommandName` verdien | Beskrivelse | |-------------------------|-----------------| |" Avbryt "| Avbryter en redigeringsoperasjon, og returnerer det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>tilgangskontroll til skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>-hendelsen. | |" Slett "| Sletter oppføringen til gjeldende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the current record in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>hendelser. | |" Rediger "| Setter oppføringen til gjeldende i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>-hendelsen. | |" Siden "| Utfører en operasjon for Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: Sets the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Angir den `CommandArgument` for knappen til "Første", "siste", "Neste", "Forrige" eller et tall til å angi hvilken type Bla operasjonen til å utføre.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> events.| |"Select"|Selects the current record.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>hendelser. | |" Velg "| Velger oppføringen til gjeldende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.| |"Sort"|Sorts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelser. | |" Sorter "| Sorterer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>hendelser. | |" Oppdateringen "| Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> events.| Although the RowCommand event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>hendelser. | Selv om RowCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp som er oppført i tabellen, anbefales det at du bruker hendelser som er oppført i tabellen for denne operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To determine the index of the row that raised the event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the event argument that is passed to the event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å finne ut indeksen i raden som hendelsen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>for hendelsen argumentet som sendes til hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> class automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property with the appropriate index value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>klassen automatisk fyller ut den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>egenskapen med den riktige indeksverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: For other command buttons, you must manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the command button.
trans-unit.target: For andre kommandoknapper, må du angi manuelt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>-egenskapen for kommandoknappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> to `<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no paging enabled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel ikke angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>til `<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>` når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen har ingen Bla aktivert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is created in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad er opprettet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt må opprettes for hver rad i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowCreated event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: RowCreated denne hendelsen oppstår når hver rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel legge til egendefinert innhold til en rad når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan få tilgang til egenskapene for rad som opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til en bestemt celle i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå hvilke radtypen (overskriftsraden dataraden og så videre) opprettes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data row is bound to data in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en datarad er bundet til data i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, hver rad i kontrollen må være bundet til en oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowDataBound event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowDataBound denne hendelsen oppstår når en datarad (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet) er bundet til data i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel å endre verdiene i databundet til raden når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being bound.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan få tilgang til egenskapene radverdiene bindes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til en bestemt celle i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being bound by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå hvilke radtypen (overskriftsraden dataraden og så videre) er blir bundet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Delete knappen, men når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen sletter raden.

trans-unit.source: The RowDeleted event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: RowDeleted-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Delete knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av sletteoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut hvor mange berørt av rader og eventuelle unntak som kan ha forekommet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Delete knappen, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen sletter raden.

trans-unit.source: The RowDeleting event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: RowDeleting-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Delete knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for den gjeldende raden og å angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>samlinger, eventuelt før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Rediger-knappen, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll registrerer redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The RowEditing event is raised when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: RowEditing-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Rediger-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll registrerer redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter redigeringsoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for den gjeldende raden og å angi at redigeringsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte redigeringsoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the column to use as the column header for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på kolonnen som brukes som kolonneoverskrift for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the header of a table can be associated with either a row or a column.
trans-unit.target: Hodet i en tabell kan være knyttet til en rad eller en kolonne i HTML.

trans-unit.source: The direction is specified by setting the `scope` attribute of the `<th>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Retningen angis ved å angi den `scope` for den `<th>` elementer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in header row that can be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen har innebygd overskriftsrad som kan vises ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally specify a header column (usually the first or last column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi en kolonne (vanligvis den første eller siste kolonnen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) ved å angi denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, all cells in the column that corresponds to the specified field name are rendered as `<th scope="row">` elements.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, alle celler i kolonnen som tilsvarer det angitte filnavnet gjengis som `<th scope="row">` elementer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the specified column is treated like a header, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> properties do not apply to the header column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om den angitte kolonnen behandles som en topptekst i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>Egenskaper gjelder ikke for overskriftskolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Standard-gjengivelse av den `<th>` elementet opprettholdes, gjengivelse teksten fet og midtstilt vannrett.

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the behavior of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan overstyre virkemåten for den `<th>` elementet med gjennomgripende style arket.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property works only with bound fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen fungerer bare med bundne felt.

trans-unit.source: It does not work with template fields.
trans-unit.target: Det virker ikke med mal-felt.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to use as the column header.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen som brukes som kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects that represent the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objekter som representerer datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Rows property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen rader (samlingen) brukes til å lagre dataradene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates the Rows collection by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object for each record in the data source and then adding each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen fyller automatisk samlingen rader ved å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt for hver oppføring i datakilden, og deretter legge til alle objektene i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å få tilgang til en bestemt rad i kontrollen eller gå gjennom hele samlingen av rader.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only rows with their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property set to `DataControlRowType.DataRow` are stored in the Rows collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bare rader med sine <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>-egenskapen satt til `DataControlRowType.DataRow` lagres i samlingen rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekter som representerer topptekst, bunntekst og personsøker radene inkluderes ikke i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle dataradene i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til datarader i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the RowStyle settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>egenskapen også er angitt, dataradene vises veksling mellom RowStyle innstillingene og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>innstillinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `RowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<RowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<RowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `RowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen oppdaterer raden.

trans-unit.source: The RowUpdated event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: RowUpdated-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av oppdateringen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut hvor mange berørt av rader og eventuelle unntak som kan ha forekommet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen oppdaterer raden.

trans-unit.source: The RowUpdating event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: RowUpdating-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte oppdateringen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til metoden hendelseshåndtering som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for den gjeldende raden og å angi at oppdateringen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte oppdateringen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>samlinger, eventuelt før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig måte å bruke disse samlingene som HTML-kode verdiene som er oppgitt av brukeren før de er lagret i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Dette bidrar til å forhindre skriptet innsetting angrep.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections are automatically populated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>samlinger automatisk er fylt ut bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er bundet til data ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll som må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å lagre tilstanden til egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den serverkontroll gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that contains the data key value for the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> objekt som inneholder data nøkkelverdien for den valgte rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for hver rad i kontrollen med verdien eller verdiene for det angitte feltet eller felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekter legges deretter til kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>egenskapen brukes til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for en bestemt datarad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the SelectedDataKey property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du nettopp må du hente det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet gjeldende rad, du kan bare bruke egenskapen SelectedDataKey som en snarvei.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dette er den samme som henter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet i indeksen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>til å hente data nøkkelverdien for gjeldende rad direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed SelectedDataKey property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objekt og vil få tilgang til et nøkkelfelt enn det første feltet, bruker du indekserte SelectedDataKey-egenskapen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: An example is shown below.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> for the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
