trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> for den valgte rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at ingen rad er valgt.

trans-unit.source: No data keys are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ingen datanøkler er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen i den valgte rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to determine the index of the currently selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for gjeldende rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically select a row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til programmatisk velger en rad i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To clear the selection of a row, set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Fjern utvalg av en rad, kan du angi denne egenskapen til-1.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the currently selected row can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til gjeldende rad kan tilpasses ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the currently selected row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til gjeldende rad, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for merket rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at ingen rad er for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex-egenskapen er satt til en verdi mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Select knappen, men når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanged event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndexChanged-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Select knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel oppdatere statusen etikett med gjeldende rad, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad Select knappen, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanging event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndexChanging-hendelsen oppstår når en rad Select knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter valgoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen i raden som brukeren har valgt og å angi at valgoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte valgoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-key value for the persisted selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for data-nøkkelen for det valgte faste elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The data key for the persisted selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene nøkkel for fast valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, som angir at ingen elementer for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer gjeldende rad i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a row is selected in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, use the SelectedRow property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents that row.
trans-unit.target: Når en rad er valgt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere, bruke egenskapen SelectedRow til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer denne raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dette er den samme som henter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet i indeksen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet kan deretter brukes til å få tilgang til egenskapene for den valgte raden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer gjeldende rad i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi utseendet til merket rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedRowStyle property to control the appearance of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til merket rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<SelectedRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<SelectedRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for merket rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data nøkkelverdi merket rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set with a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt med en kommadelt liste over feltnavnene som representerer primærnøkkelen for datakilden, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for hver rad i kontrollen med verdien eller verdiene for det angitte feltet eller felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekter legges deretter til kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>egenskapen brukes til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for en bestemt datarad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du nettopp må ikke hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet gjeldende rad, du kan bare bruke de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen som en snarvei.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: As a further shortcut, you can directly determine the data key value of the first key field of the selected row by using the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: Flere snarvei kan du bestemme data nøkkelverdi første nøkkelfeltet i den valgte raden direkte ved å bruke egenskapen SelectedValue.

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objekt, og vil ha tilgang til et nøkkelfelt enn første felt, og bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se et eksempel se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for verdien for den valgte rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Selects the row to edit in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Merker raden til å redigere i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden vil redigere.

trans-unit.source: Puts a row in edit mode in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control by using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: Legger en rad i redigeringsmodus i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll ved hjelp av den angitte radindeksen.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden vil redigere.

trans-unit.source: Sets the page index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control by using the row index.
trans-unit.target: Angir siden indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll ved hjelp av radindeksen.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row on the page to edit.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden på siden for å redigere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the footer row is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bunntekstraden skal vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowFooter property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowFooter-egenskapen til å angi om en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser bunntekstraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinere radverdiene bunntekst, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the footer row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis bunntekstrad; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header row is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om overskriftsraden vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowHeader property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the header row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowHeader-egenskapen til å angi om en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>viser kontrollen overskriftsraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere utseendet til overskriftsraden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the header row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis overskriftsraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the heading of a column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is visible when the column has no data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om overskrift for en kolonne i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er synlig når kolonnen har ingen data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overskriften er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control based on the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontroll basert på angitte sorteringsuttrykk og retning.

trans-unit.source: Use the Sort method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden sortering programmatisk sortere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere ved hjelp av angitte sorteringsuttrykk og retning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression specifies the column or columns with which to sort.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket angir kolonnen eller kolonnene som skal sorteres.

trans-unit.source: To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sortere flere kolonner, kan du opprette et sorteringsuttrykk som inneholder en kommadelt liste over feltnavn.

trans-unit.source: The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsretningen angir om sortering er utført i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du vil sortere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere fra utenfor kontrollen, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method is also commonly used to programmatically set a default sort order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when it is first rendered.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes også vanligvis programmatisk til å angi en standard sortering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer når den gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression with which to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket som skal sorteres i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source control, but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> that is associated with the data source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakildekontroll, men <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> som er tilknyttet med datatypen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort direction of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter sorteringsretningen i kolonnen som sorteres etter.

trans-unit.source: Use the SortDirection property to determine whether the column being sorted is sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SortDirection-egenskapen til å fastslå om kolonnen er sortert er sortert i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen har en innebygd sortering funksjon som automatisk, settes denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the sort direction or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare når du skal fastslå sorteringsretningen eller når du legger til dine egne egendefinerte sortering funksjonaliteten for å programmatisk en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The Sorted event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Sorted-hendelsen oppstår når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as custom sorting, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel egendefinert sortering når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir CSS-stil for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kolonne når kolonnen er sortert i stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, en stilen cellene i kolonnen når dataene er sortert i stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is ascending.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen kan for eksempel merkes med en bestemt farge når typen sorteringen er stigende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en stilen den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kolonnen er sortert i stigende rekkefølge; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style to apply to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column heading when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir CSS-stil til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kolonneoverskrift når kolonnen er sortert i stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, en pil som angir sorteringsretningen vises i kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> heading when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en stilen den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> overskrift når kolonnen er sortert i stigende rekkefølge; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kolonne når kolonnen er sortert i synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, en stilen cellene i kolonnen når dataene er sortert i synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is descending.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen kan for eksempel merkes med en bestemt farge når typen Sorter synkende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en stilen den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> når kolonnen er sortert i synkende rekkefølge; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column heading when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stil til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kolonneoverskrift når kolonnen er sortert i synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, en pil som angir sorteringsretningen vises i kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> heading when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en stilen den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> overskrift når kolonnen er sortert i synkende rekkefølge; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter sorteringsuttrykk som er knyttet til kolonnen eller kolonnene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: Use the SortExpression property to determine the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SortExpression-egenskapen til å fastslå sorteringsuttrykk som er knyttet til kolonnen eller kolonnene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen har en innebygd sortering funksjon som automatisk, settes denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the column or columns being sorted or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare når du skal fastslå programmatisk kolonnen eller kolonnene som er sortert, eller når du legger til dine egne egendefinerte sortering funksjonaliteten til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When multiple columns are sorted, this property contains a comma-separated list of the fields by which to sort.
trans-unit.target: Når flere kolonner er sortert, vil denne egenskapen inneholder en kommadelt liste over felt som skal sorteres.

trans-unit.source: The sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket som er knyttet til kolonnen eller kolonnene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The Sorting event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Sorting-hendelsen oppstår når hyperkoblingen for å sortere en kolonne, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter sorteringsoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til metoden hendelseshåndtering som gjør det mulig å finne sorteringsuttrykk for kolonnen og å angi at valgoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte valgoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically initiate a sort operation, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du starte programmatisk sortering, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer resultatet av en tilbakeringing hendelse som er rettet mot en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>for asynkront datahenting og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>metode for å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*> method.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>

trans-unit.source: ICallbackEventHandler.RaiseCallbackEvent is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ICallbackEventHandler.RaiseCallbackEvent er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataverdiene som brukes til å identifisere hver forekomst av en databundet kontroll når ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Dataverdiene som brukes til å identifisere hver forekomst av en databundet kontroll når ASP.NET genererer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer de aktuelle hendelsene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs to raise the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Kall siden den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>metoden når sende tilbake hendelsen inntreffer til riktig hendelser for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kallet oppstår i livssyklusen siden etter innlasting og endre varsel er fullført, men før prerendering forekommer.

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert for å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>objekt for hendelsen eller hendelser som aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet hendelsen å opprette en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> hendelsen eller hendelser som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter tilbakeringing skriptet for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: ICallbackContainer.GetCallbackScript is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: ICallbackContainer.GetCallbackScript er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen til å opprette tilbakeringing skriptet for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: Knappekontrollen som skal opprettes tilbakeringing skriptet.

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter som sendes til tilbakeringing skriptet.

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Skriptet tilbakeringing for knapper som utfører en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnene på feltene i primærnøkkelen for elementene som vises i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is exposed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> Interface.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET dynamiske Data støtter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary-key fields for the items that are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene primærnøkkelen for elementene som skal vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table that is exposed by the data source control to bind to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tabellen som brukes av datakildekontrollen skal bindes til databindingselementer-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use this property to set the specific data table, collection, or other data for the control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden inneholder flere datakilder, kan du bruke denne egenskapen til å angi bestemte datatabellen, samlingen eller andre data for kontrollen skal bindes til.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> instance that contains multiple tables, you can specify which table to bind the control to by using this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>forekomsten som inneholder flere tabeller, kan du angi hvilken tabell for å binde kontrollen til ved hjelp av denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET dynamiske Data støtter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The table that is exposed by the data source control to bind to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen som brukes av datakildekontrollen skal bindes til databindingselementer-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the data key of each row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder data-nøkkelen for hver rad i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valg av en rad er basert på indeksen eller data nøkkelverdier.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rad utvalget er basert på data for verdier. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som inneholder data nøkkelverdien for gjeldende rad i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET dynamiske Data støtter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The data-key value for the selected row.
trans-unit.target: Data-nøkkel-verdien for den valgte raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for den valgte raden i databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET dynamiske Data støtter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected row in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den valgte raden i databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that automatically generates the columns for a data-bound control for use by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kontrollen som automatisk genererer kolonner for en databundet-kontroll for bruk av ASP.NET dynamiske Data.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IFieldControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IFieldControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IFieldControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET dynamiske Data støtter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The control that automatically generates the columns for a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som automatisk genererer kolonner for en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in paging mode.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvordan merkede radene er faste når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er i modus for Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection is based on row index.
trans-unit.target: Raden valg er basert på radindeks som standard.

trans-unit.source: The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page.
trans-unit.target: Samme rad (for eksempel tredje raden) er valgt på hver side.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du aktivere utholdenhet basert på data-nøkkelen for det valgte rad.

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger rad 3 på side 1, og du flytter til 2, velges i så fall ingen rad på side 2.

trans-unit.source: If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du flytter tilbake til siden 1, er fortsatt rad 3 valgt.

trans-unit.source: To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å aktivere denne funksjonen, kan du angi denne egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I versjon 2.0, 3.0 og 3.5 av ASP.NET, rad utvalget ble etter radindeks.

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Som standard basert rad valg i ASP.NET 4 på indeksen for bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: The data-key value for the persisted selected record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Data-for-verdien for den faste valgt oppføring i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref> objektet som representerer sende tilbake virkemåten for den angitte knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: Knappekontrollen som skal opprettes tilbakeringing skriptet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref> som representerer sende tilbake virkemåten for den angitte knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The buttonControl parameter contains .
trans-unit.target: Den buttonControl parameteren inneholder .

trans-unit.source: buttonControl causes validation and is attempting to post back to the same container it validates.
trans-unit.target: buttonControlfår valideringen og prøver å legge inn tilbake til samme beholderen det validerer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey tillater utdata dataflyten å skrive riktig HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; otherwise, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>er satt til `true`, denne egenskapen returnerer `HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; ellers denne egenskapen returnerer `HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre sider og kan vises på toppen, nederst eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the TopPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TopPagerRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TopPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I TopPagerRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppretter øverste personsøker rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk raden øverste personsøker, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the TopPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen TopPagerRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the top pager row in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Sporer visningsstatus endringer i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollere slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyres for å merke startpunkt ved å begynne å spore og lagre endringene til kontrollen som en del av kontrollens visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to update data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden for å kalle for å oppdatere dataene.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen fører til at modellen binding som skal brukes som metoden databinding.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden.

trans-unit.source: Updates the record at the specified row index using the field values of the row.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer posten på den angitte radindeksen med feltverdiene i raden.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateRow method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk UpdateRow-metoden til å oppdatere programmatisk oppføring i den angitte indeksen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to update a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å oppdatere en oppføring fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method can be called only for the row that is currently in edit mode, or for a row that contains a two-way data-bound input control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden kan bare kalles bare for raden i redigeringsmodus, eller for en rad som inneholder en toveis databundet inndata kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om toveis binding uttrykk [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før oppdateringen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when this method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når denne metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source control, but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> associated with the data source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakildekontroll, men <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> som er forbundet med dataene er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control renders its header in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen gjengir hodet i tilgjengelig format.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: Use the UseAccessibleHeader property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control renders its header row in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: Bruk UseAccessibleHeader-egenskapen til å angi om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen gjengir overskriftsraden i tilgjengelig format.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of this property is `true` and the header for the control is rendered using `<th>` table header cell tags.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er som standard `true` og hodet for kontrollen gjengis med `<th>` tabell hodet celle koder.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg en `scope="col"` attributtet legges til i tabelloverskriften til å angi at toppteksten gjelder for alle cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Standard-gjengivelse av den `<th>` elementet opprettholdes, gjengivelse teksten fet og midtstilt vannrett.

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the style of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan overstyre stilen for den `<th>` elementet med gjennomgripende style arket.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the header for the control is rendered using `<td>` table cell tags.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen `false`, hodet for kontrollen gjengis med `<td>` tabell celler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen gjengir hodet i tilgjengelig format; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the data source that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir virtuelle antallet elementer i datakilden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til når egendefinert Bla brukes.

trans-unit.source: This property is used only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The virtual number of items in the data source that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: Virtuell antallet elementer i dataene kildetabellen som det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til når egendefinert Bla brukes.
